QuestData.Title: Return from the Firelands
QuestData.Description: I'll usher out the rest of the followers of Lo'Gosh and seal this portal behind us.$B$BThe rest of our forces at Mount Hyjal will want to hear of this victory. Return to Takrik Ragehowl and let him know what we've discovered and how we were triumphant!$B$BSimply step through the portal to return to Mount Hyjal.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Takrik Ragehowl at the Shrine of Goldrinn in Hyjal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Takrik Ragehowl at the Shrine of Goldrinn in Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: They're moving supplies to Hyjal straight from the elemental planes? Devious.$B$BYou've made Lo'Gosh proud by sealing that flamegate, $n, but there may be more portals to seal. You should check with the other shrines!
